metadata.feature_description: Allows users to browse, search, and filter files including images, documents, and other file types within the portal.

steps.action: Navigate to Assets panel and enter 'batch' in the Search Files field
steps.expected: Files containing 'batch' in the filename should be displayed
steps.actual: Search returned 1 file: batch_image_3.png with 'batch' highlighted

issues: Search for 'batch' returned only 1 result when there were 3 files with 'batch' in the name (batch_image_2.png, batch_image_2-Copy.png, batch_image_3.png). Possible search indexing issue.

steps.action: Click on the 'Images' folder from the Home directory
steps.expected: Files and folders within the Images folder should be displayed
steps.actual: Navigated successfully to Images folder showing subfolders (MoveTestFolder, Publisher, etc.) and image files with thumbnails

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View recent files (Sort by Last Modified)

steps.action: Click the Sort dropdown and select 'Last Modified'
steps.expected: Files and folders should be reordered by most recently modified first
steps.actual: Sort changed to 'Last Modified' and content order changed to show recently modified items first

steps.action: Navigate from Home to Images folder, then to Publisher subfolder
steps.expected: Breadcrumb should show HOME > IMAGES > PUBLISHER and files within Publisher should be displayed
steps.actual: Successfully navigated through folder hierarchy. Breadcrumb showed HOME > IMAGES > PUBLISHER with publisher images displayed

steps.action: Click Home in breadcrumb to navigate back
steps.expected: Should return to Home folder showing all root folders and files
steps.actual: Successfully navigated back to Home via breadcrumb

steps.action: Click 'Add Folder' and create a new folder named 'EmptyTestFolder2026'
steps.expected: New folder should be created and appear in the file list
steps.actual: Folder 'EmptyTestFolder2026' was created successfully and appeared in the list

steps.action: Click on the newly created empty folder
steps.expected: Empty folder should display with an appropriate empty state message
steps.actual: Empty folder displayed message 'This Folder is Empty' with helpful text 'Use the tools above to add an asset or create a folder'

steps.action: View the file browser grid with various file types
steps.expected: Image files should show thumbnail previews, other file types should show appropriate icons
steps.actual: Image files (batch_image_2.png, CTA-1.jpg, cavalier-logo.png) displayed thumbnail previews. XML files showed code icons. Text/doc files showed document icons.

issues: Clicking on a file downloads it instead of opening a detailed preview panel. Thumbnails serve as the only preview mechanism.

steps.action: Enter '(special)' in the Search Files field and press Enter
steps.expected: Files containing '(special)' should be found and displayed
steps.actual: Search found 'test file (special) #1.txt' with 'special' highlighted in yellow. Breadcrumb showed SEARCH '(SPECIAL)'

observations: Code in FileBrowserController.cs suggests GetImages and GetDocuments API methods exist for filtering by file type, but no UI element was found in the Assets panel to filter by 'images only' or 'documents only'. These API methods may be used by other modules like media pickers.
The search functionality appears to have indexing issues - searching for 'batch' returned only 1 of 3 matching files. This may warrant further investigation.
File preview is limited to thumbnails in the grid view. Clicking a file initiates a download rather than opening a detailed preview/properties panel.
Sort options available: Alphabetical, Last Modified, Date Uploaded - all working correctly.
Folder types available: Standard, Secure, Database, and external storage (Box, Dropbox).
The long folder name 'ThisIsAVeryLongFolderNameToTestTheBoundaryLimitsOf...' is properly truncated in the UI with ellipsis.
